name: grilluglyskill
0:
”Alexa, ask grill ugly what is status”
”Alexa, ask grill ugly to set the temperature to two hundred fifty degrees”
”Alexa, ask grill ugly what are probe temperatures”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grill ugly
des:
Alexa control and monitoring of both a GrillUgly Smoker controller and a GrillUgly Smoker Monitor. A GrillUgly Smoker controller can set and monitor pellet smoker temperatures along with monitoring GrillUgly probe temperatures. A GrillUgly Smoker Monitor can provide probe temperature monitoring.

This skill only works with GrillUgly. GrillUgly controllers and monitors are not available for sale at this time.
